result.title: Model LCA and TEA for tandem
result.description: Report on the final model for LCA and TEA of the stacked and monolothic perovskite-on-CIS tandem technology, discussing the scientific, technological, environmental and economic potential of perovskite-on-CIS tandem technologies. Final statement regarding the reduced use of critical materials, e.g. Indium. Final statement regarding the emissions reductions.
